Not reproduced on my end.

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end - the site opens fine.
Try to leave only AdGuard filters, update them (wait almost one minute there), clear browser data, restart the browser, open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).
